channel.title: Client & server run error
channel.description:
Hey there, I got some problems that i cant sort out, i used to be good at these problems, but after 1 year of no coding, no rsps, no java, i really forgot these things, and now im back and ran into some problems.. When I try to run a client i get the error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press a button to continue...
And when I run a server I get this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press a button to continue...
I appreciate if I can get some help :)

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

InsidiaX runs on Java version 7 or higher.

Just update your java, so many people have this error with InsidiaX.

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:6, topic:418086”]InsidiaX runs on Java version 7 or higher.

You could try this .bat

[Client]

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

If it doesn’t work, update your java.[/quote]

Now I get the “'The path is not yet specified”, that is definetly something in my enviromental variables, im sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

InsidiaX runs on Java version 7 or higher.

You could try this .bat

[Client]

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

If it doesn’t work, update your java.

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

InsidiaX, I run Windows 7 64-bit

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Vengpwe:

No matter what I edit in the .bat file i get the same error and I aint so dumb that I cant fix the .bat, i think maybe environment variables is the problem, but I dont know…

Post your .bat code up. What type of server would also be nice to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server run error
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

It can’t find the route to your main client file, you need to edit your .bat properly.

Read full topic
